May 18, 2014 D SCABA Entertainment Contest (A Section)
SCABA Entertainment Contest (A Section) 10 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark SCABA Entertainment Contest scaba-entertainment-contest-a-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Epsom & Ewell and Ocean Brass Withdrawn. Points awarded for Music (60), Entertainment Value (30), Presentation & Deportment (10) Additional prizes for best March and best Soloist
Best Soloist – Richard Straker, cornet, Friary Guildford Best March – Friary Guildford Highest unplaced 1st section band – Fulham
May 14, 2014, 3:31 p.m. May 19, 2014, 8:32 a.m.
1 Friary Brass Band Chris King
2 Otterbourne Brass Gareth Pritchard
3 BAE Systems Jonathan Crowhurst
4 Fulham Brass Band John Ward
5 Tilbury Andrew Austin
6 Alder Valley Brass Roger Burke
7 Yiewsley and West Drayton Band Chris Cole
Withdrawn Ocean Brass Edward March
Withdrawn Epsom & Ewell Silver Band Jack Smith
